translations: n.纠纷；意见不合；争吵；倾轧

phrs.translation: 意见不合, 冲突, 意见分歧
内讧, 内部纷争, 审问
挑拨离间, 分化离间
家庭纠纷, 婚姻家庭纠纷, 翻译

sentences.sentence: The tax cut issue has caused dissension among administration officials.
sentences.translation: 减税议题在政府官员内部引发了争辩。

sentences.sentence: This world too much dissension, want all but are not.
sentences.translation: 这世界太多纷纷扰扰，想要的一切却都得不到。

sentences.sentence: The rebels will be weakened still more if such internal dissension spreads.
sentences.translation: 如果这种内讧继续蔓延，反对派的势力将被进一步削弱。
